title: Emergency Funds and Investing
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Emergency Funds and Investing.

hook.text: A laid-off worker had to sell stocks at a 35% loss to pay rent because he had no cash reserves.

discovery.text: Its job isn't to earn returns. Its job is to keep you from selling investments at the worst time.

climax.text: Building an emergency fund before investing is the single best risk-management move a beginner can make.

punchline.text: An emergency fund doesn't grow your wealth. It protects it.
